title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - the perfect solution for all your emergency power needs! This easy-to-use device is specifically designed to be accessible and user-friendly for elderly folks. With its powerful features and characteristics, you can stay confident and prepared on the road.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter boasts a peak current of 4000, ensuring that it can jump-start your vehicle with ease. It has a high battery capacity of 27800 mAh, providing you with long-lasting power. The 88 Wh battery capacity ensures reliable performance when you need it most.

This versatile jump starter is compatible with both gasoline and diesel engines, making it suitable for all types of vehicles. It can handle gasoline engines of any size and diesel engines up to 10L, giving you peace of mind no matter what you drive.

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box battery booster type, this jump starter is incredibly convenient and reliable. It features an array of useful functions, including a built-in LED light for enhanced visibility in dark situations. The USB quick charge 3.0 technology allows you to charge your devices rapidly, so you never have to worry about running out of power.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter also includes a type C input/output, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of devices. It incorporates an intelligent protection system that safeguards against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, ensuring your safety at all times.

Designed with portability in mind, this jump starter is lightweight and easy to carry. It comes with a comprehensive package that includes a portable battery starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and user manual. You'll have everything you need for a seamless experience.

Rest assured, our 24-hour online after-sales team is always available to assist you with any queries or concerns you may have. We prioritize your satisfaction and are committed to ensuring your peace of mind.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is the ultimate solution for elderly folks who want a reliable, user-friendly, and powerful device to keep them safe on the road. Don't get caught off guard - invest in the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the difference it can make in your life.

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the perfect companion for your vehicle! This powerful jump starter is designed to be easily accessible and user-friendly, especially for our beloved elderly folks who may find technology confusing.

With a peak current of 4000, this jump starter has the strength to jumpstart your car, motorcycle, ATV, UTV, lawn mower, or snowmobile with ease. It is compatible with both gasoline and diesel engines up to 10L, making it suitable for a wide range of vehicles.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter features a high-capacity 27800mAh battery that delivers a reliable and long-lasting performance. It also has a battery capacity of 88Wh, ensuring that you have enough power to jumpstart your vehicle multiple times on a single charge.

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box, this jump starter is incredibly convenient and portable. It comes with a rugged design and metal clamps for added durability and reliability.

Safety is our top priority, which is why the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is packed with intelligent protection systems. It safeguards against short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, ensuring a worry-free jumpstarting experience.

The jump starter also features a built-in LED light with multiple modes including flashlight, SOS, and strobe. This provides additional visibility and safety in case of emergencies.

Charging your devices on-the-go is made easy with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. It offers quick charging capabilities with USB 3.0 and Type-C input/output ports. The USB ports supply 5V/3A, 9V/2A, and 12V/1.5A, while the Type-C port delivers a 5V/2.4A output. You can charge your smartphones, tablets, and other electronic devices at lightning-fast speeds.

In the package, you will find everything you need for a seamless experience. It includes the Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. We've got you covered!

Rest assured, our dedicated 24-hour online after-sales team is here to provide you with any assistance you may need. We prioritize your satisfaction and are committed to ensuring your happiness with your purchase.

Please note that an adapter is not included, so make sure to use your existing adapter for charging the jump starter.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the peace of mind that comes with knowing you're always prepared for any unexpected situations on the road.

Rest assured, our 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you. Please note that an adapter is not included.
